directions: In a medium saucepan over medium heat, melt butter.  Stir in curry powder and cook 1 minute.  Stir in leeks, potato and apples and cook 5 minutes.  Pour in broth and bring to a boil.  Cover, reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes.
Puree in a blender or food processor, or using an immersion blender.  Season with salt and pepper and serve with a swirl of yogurt.
ingredients: 2 Granny Smith apples -- peeled, cored and chopped
title: Curried Apple and Leek Soup
